block.p: MARIGNANI-Caroline (nee Curtayne). Of Southbury, CT. on October 17, 2000. Beloved daughter of Grace Smith Curtayne and the late E. Vincent Curtayne. Loving mother of Matteo Marignani and Marta Leo. Sister of Mary Wellman and Sr. Mary Alphonsus. Mass of Christian Burial to be held Thursday, October 19, 10AM at Sacred Heart Church, Southbury, CT. Calling hours today, 4-8PM at Munson-Lovetere Funeral Home, 235 Main Street No., Southbury, CT. Memorial contributions may be made to The Sisters of the Poor Convent, 1365 Enfield Street, Enfield, CT. 06082.
